document.full_text: warren buffett's conglomerate berkshire hathaway inc reported a smaller profit for the first quarter, as reinsurance losses from the march 11 earthquake in japan dragged down results.
document.title: berkshire hathaway profit falls on japan quake
lines_and_colors: warren buffett's conglomerate berkshire hathaway inc reported a smaller profit for the first quarter, as reinsurance losses from the march 11 earthquake in japan dragged down results.
